Each year certain power stations are required by federal law to shut down for regular maintenance in the winter when the power is usually on very low draw. '' Future Potential Google Inc. 's Eric Schmidt said in a separate interview at the World Economic Forum that the high value attributed to some young companies is on par with their future potential. The e-commerce space feels overheated because valuations are based on long-term revenue expectations, said Eric Schmidt , who plans to step down from his role as CEO and become executive chairman in April.
